journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tentevitskaya, L.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry

abstract.value: Nowadays in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus works aimed on preservation and reproduction of collection genetic fish resources are carried out in experimental fishery station 'Izobelino'. Native and introduced fish species are grown and evaluated according the main fishery characteristics. The article contains the results of breeding of fingerlings of Cherepetsky mirror carp imported into the Republic of Belarus. The results of experimental growing of fingerlings of carp of different origin are presented. Extensity of swim bladder inflammation disorder is analyzed. Ranging of the variances of experimental growing of Cherepetsky mirror carp is displayed. As a result of growing of fingerlings within the six-fold repetition, the optimum stock density of 1 specimen per 1 hectare of the nursery area is determined. The correlation relationship between the most important fisheries characteristics (body mass, viability, swim bladder inflammation level )is determined.
